title: Ep 13: Old Habits Die Hard with Mary H.K. Choi
itunes:title: Ep 13: Old Habits Die Hard with Mary H.K. Choi
itunes:subtitle: Doree and Kate discuss Doree's recent trip to Target -- where she was tempted by the sweet, affordable Universal Thread line -- and the feeling of backsliding on her commitment to try to only buy sustainable or secondhand clothing. Then t...
description:
Doree and Kate discuss Doree's recent trip to Target -- where she was tempted by the sweet, affordable Universal Thread line -- and the feeling of backsliding on her commitment to try to only buy sustainable or secondhand clothing. Then the women speak to Mary H.K. Choi (author of the YA novel Emergency Contact) about binge eating, letting go of old habits, and that one time she purchased a $4000 jacket. Plus she recommends a classic red lipstick! 

Programming Note: This episode contains discussion of eating disorders. 


This episode is sponsored by:

  •  Begins With Skin. Use code Forever35 at beginswithskin.com to get 10% off your first order. 
  • Hello Fresh. For $30 off your first week of HelloFresh, visit hellofresh.com and enter promo code Forever35. 
  • Lola. For 40% off your first order, visit mylola.com and enter Forever35 when you subscribe.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
